verses.roman:
nityānanda vinā prabhuke dhare kon jana
prabhura āveśa nā yāya, nā rahe kīrtana

synonyms: nityānanda vinā—except for Nityānanda Prabhu; prabhuke—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dhare—can catch; kon jana—what person; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āveśa—the ecstasy; nā yāya—does not go away; nā rahe—could not be continued; kīrtana—kīrtana.
translation: Only Nityānanda Prabhu could catch Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, but the ecstatic mood of the Lord would not stop. At the same time, kīrtana could not be continued.
